title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 523 – 538) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the first portion of the Fishman Island arc, covering episodes 523-538 including episode 533. The review discusses the arc's pacing, character development, and thematic elements.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire first half of the Fishman Island arc

title: Why One Piece's Fishman Island Arc Is The Absolute Worst Of The Anime
author: CinemaBlend Editorial
description: An editorial piece examining why the Fishman Island arc, which includes episode 533, has a reputation for being one of the most criticized arcs in One Piece, discussing pacing issues and comparing it to the 2024 remaster.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Fishman Island arc

title: All Of Chopper's Forms in the One Piece Anime
author: CBR Editorial
description: An article ranking and explaining all of Chopper's transformations, including Kung Fu Point which debuts in episode 533. Discusses the abilities, strengths, and fan reception of each form.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Chopper's transformations throughout the series

title: All 10 of Chopper's Transformations in 'One Piece,' Explained
author: The Mary Sue Editorial
description: A detailed explanation of all of Tony Tony Chopper's transformations including Kung Fu Point, explaining how each form works and when they were introduced in the series.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers all of Chopper's transformations throughout One Piece

title: One Piece Episode 533 Recap: Zoro and Kung Fu Chopper
author: ezeekat
description: A short TikTok video recapping the key moments of episode 533, focusing on Zoro's decision-making and Chopper's Kung Fu Point debut.

title: I Don't Love the New One Piece Remaster, But It Does Fix a Key Issue From the Original Anime
author: Screen Rant Editorial
description: An opinion piece discussing the 2024 One Piece Log: Fish-Man Island Saga remaster and how it addresses pacing issues from the original arc, which includes episode 533.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses the entire Fishman Island arc

title: Exploring Racism and Activism in Fishman Island: A Deep Dive into One Piece
author: Galaxy.ai
description: A summary/analysis of a YouTube video that explores the deep themes of racism, discrimination, and activism present in the Fishman Island arc, providing cultural and thematic context for episodes like 533.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Analyzes themes throughout the entire Fishman Island arc

title: Hiroshi Kitadani, Maki Otsuki Perform New Versions of 'We Go!' with hololive VTubers for One Piece Log: Fish-Man Island Saga Anime
author: Anime News Network
description: News article about the 2024-2025 remaster of the Fish-Man Island Saga featuring a new version of 'We Go!', the opening song used in episode 533 of the original series.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: News article about opening song, minimal spoilers

title: Episode 533, 'The Dork Knight'
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: The One Piece Podcast discusses various One Piece topics in their episode 533, though the episode title 'The Dork Knight' suggests it may not be directly about anime episode 533.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Podcast episode numbering does not match anime episode numbers
